schema: {"type":"record","name":"MessageEnvelope","namespace":"com.xabe.avro.v1","fields":[{"name":"metadata","type":{"type":"record","name":"Metadata","doc":"Message context attributes","fields":[{"name":"name","type":{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"},"doc":"Unique name of the entity contained in the payload. I.e. 'cart'"},{"name":"domain","type":{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"},"doc":"Functional domain of the entity contained in the payload. I.e. 'purchase'"},{"name":"version","type":{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"},"doc":"Version of the entity contained in the payload"},{"name":"id","type":["null",{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"}],"doc":"Unique identifier of the the carDO","default":null},{"name":"timestamp","type":{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"},"doc":"Timestamp of the occurrence of the business carDO"},{"name":"action","type":{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"},"doc":"Identifier of the action that generated the carDO. I.e. 'modified'"},{"name":"envelope","type":["null",{"type":"record","name":"Envelope","doc":"Data relative to the message container used to envelop the carDO","fields":[{"name":"name","type":{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"},"doc":"Name of the message container used. I.e. 'pipe-carDO'"},{"name":"version","type":{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"},"doc":"Specific container version"}]}],"doc":"Data relative to the message container used to envelop the carDO","default":null},{"name":"classifiers","type":["null",{"type":"array","items":{"type":"record","name":"Classifier","doc":"Defines the identity of a message using a set of keys extracted from the message payload","fields":[{"name":"name","type":{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"},"doc":"Name of the classifier in order to make comparisons between events with the same classifier defined"},{"name":"values","type":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"}},"doc":"Ordered values that define the final classifier value"}]}}],"doc":"Set of classifiers to define different identities related with the carDO","default":null},{"name":"extensions","type":["null",{"type":"record","name":"Extensions","namespace":"com.xabe.avro.v1.extensions","doc":"Set of attributes for attaching common information to the carDO with analytic purposes","fields":[{"name":"flows","type":["null",{"type":"array","items":{"type":"record","name":"LifecycleExtension","doc":"Information about the transition represented by the carDO in the life cycle of a process model or artifact","fields":[{"name":"name","type":{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"},"doc":"Process model or artifact related to the carDO"},{"name":"domain","type":["null",{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"}],"doc":"Domain of the process model or artifact related to the carDO","default":null},{"name":"instance","type":["null",{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"}],"doc":"Specific instance of the process model or artifact, if it's known","default":null},{"name":"correlation","type":["null",{"type":"map","values":{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"},"avro.java.string":"String"}],"doc":"Correlation identifiers between states of a flow. They will be defined for each functional case with the Data Architecture Analytics team.","default":null},{"name":"transition","type":["null",{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"}],"doc":"Lifecycle transition represented by the carDO","default":null},{"name":"state","type":["null",{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"}],"doc":"Specifies the state reached within the process model or the artifact lifecycle that triggered the carDO","default":null}]}}],"doc":"Information about process models or artifacts the carDO is related to","default":null},{"name":"geo","type":["null",{"type":"record","name":"GeoExtension","doc":"Information about geographical points and shapes related with an carDO","fields":[{"name":"point","type":["null",{"type":"record","name":"GeoPoint","doc":"Information about geographical points in WGS84 reference system","fields":[{"name":"lon","type":"double","doc":"Longitude of the geopoint"},{"name":"lat","type":"double","doc":"Latitude of the geopoint"}]}],"doc":"Geographical point related to the carDO in WGS84 reference system","default":null},{"name":"features","type":["null",{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"}],"doc":"Geographical features related to the carDO in GeoJSON format","default":null}]}],"doc":"Information about location related to the carDO","default":null}]}],"doc":"Data relative to the business context that the message belongs to","default":null},{"name":"relationships","type":["null",{"type":"array","items":{"type":"record","name":"Relationship","doc":"Represents a relationship between the message and a specific business entity","fields":[{"name":"name","type":{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"},"doc":"Unique name of the entity"},{"name":"domain","type":{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"},"doc":"Functional domain. I.e. 'ECommerce'"},{"name":"version","type":["null",{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"}],"doc":"Version of the entity definition","default":null},{"name":"type","type":{"type":"enum","name":"RelationshipType","symbols":["createdBy","causes","dependsOn","hasA","partOf","memberOf"]},"doc":"Specific type of the relationship between the carDO and the business entity"},{"name":"data","type":["null",{"type":"map","values":{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"},"avro.java.string":"String"}],"doc":"Specific data of the related entity at the moment the carDO is triggered","default":null}]}}],"doc":"Relationship between the message and different business entities","default":null},{"name":"context","type":["null",{"type":"map","values":{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"},"avro.java.string":"String"}],"doc":"Context data of the message that does not belong in the definition of the main entity","default":null}]},"doc":"PIPE specific metadata."},{"name":"payload","type":[{"type":"record","name":"CarCreated","fields":[{"name":"car","type":{"type":"record","name":"Car","fields":[{"name":"id","type":{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"}},{"name":"name","type":{"type":"string","avro.java.string":"String"}}]}},{"name":"sent_at","type":"long","logicalType":"timestamp-micros"}]},{"type":"record","name":"CarDeleted","fields":[{"name":"car","type":"Car"},{"name":"sent_at","type":"long","logicalType":"timestamp-micros"}]},{"type":"record","name":"CarUpdated","fields":[{"name":"car","type":"Car"},{"name":"car_before_update","type":"Car"},{"name":"sent_at","type":"long","logicalType":"timestamp-micros"}]}],"doc":"Envelope's content. It could be any Car command."}],"subject":"car.v1-value"}
